1.0.name: wordpress/events-planner
1.0.description:
Events Planner is a next generation Event Registration Plugin, built with standard WordPress tools (Custom Post Types, Custom Fields, Options), making it extremely powerful and flexible. The Lite version is very capable on its own but check out the PRO for some incredibly powerful tools and capabilities. With the PRO v1.4 around the corner, you will have the ability to accept multiple registrations, offer more flexible discounts and tons of buying options.

New in version 1.3.2

  • Confirmation emails to the registrant and the admin, date and time formatting ....
  • Read More

New in version 1.3

  • Downloadable list of registrations (status, payment info, attendees, regis field responses...) in CSV format, AJAX powered quick info access to Registration and Payment Info, better available space
